alert.note: Alert for Charles City; Eastern Essex; Eastern King William; Eastern King and Queen; Gloucester; James City; Lancaster; Middlesex; New Kent; Northumberland; Prince George; Richmond; Surry; Western Essex; Western King William; Western King and Queen; Westmoreland; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 21 at 11:54PM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT MIDDLESEX...NORTHWESTERN NORTHUMBERLAND...NORTHWESTERN YORK...JAMES CITY...NORTHWESTERN GLOUCESTER...KING AND QUEEN...CHARLES CITY...PRINCE GEORGE... RICHMOND...NEW KENT...SOUTHERN WESTMORELAND...SOUTHEASTERN KING WILLIAM...NORTHWESTERN SURRY...ESSEX AND WESTERN LANCASTER COUNTIES...THE CITY OF HOPEWELL...THE SOUTHEASTERN CITY OF PETERSBURG AND THE CITY OF WILLIAMSBURG THROUGH 1245 AM EST... At 1153 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a line extending from Newland to Adkins Store to Prince George. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... New Kent, Charles City, Tappahannock, Warsaw, Montross, King And Queen Court House, Millers Tavern, Stevensville, Garysville, and Dunnsville around 1200 AM EST. West Point, Holdcroft, and Center Cross around 1205 AM EST. Claremont, Haynesville, Hague, Sharps, Cabin Point, Rustic, Little Plymouth, and Barhamsville around 1210 AM EST. Toano, Church View, Jamaica, Kinsale, Farnham, and Shacklefords around 1215 AM EST. Callao, Robley, Norge, and Morattico around 1220 AM EST. Williamsburg, Urbanna, Saluda, Glenns, and Heathsville around 1225 AM EST. College Of William And Mary and Lancaster around 1230 AM EST. Jamestown around 1235 AM EST. Other locations impacted by these storms include Eltham, Threeway, Croaker, Wayside, Belle Isle State Park, Rose Garden, Lyells, Richard Bland College, Crouch, and Westmoreland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
